Mayor and City Council
======================

Physical Address:

Garden Ridge, TX 78266

Mailing Address:

9400 Municipal Parkway  
Garden Ridge, TX 78266

Phone:

[(210) 651-6632](tel:2106516632)

Fax:

(210) 651-9638
